summary:
Add Perk Points!
Does not require any DLCs or Script Extenders.
Tested. Works.
descriptionHtml:
----------

Akatosh himself has decided to bless you on your journey, Dovahkiin.
That is, if you can find his Elder Scroll.
When you do, you need only invoke his name to receive his power.

----------

Tested.
Works.
